name: Revival Chase
overview: Here's another indie/homebrew release for the TurboGrafx-CD (Super CD-ROM). This time it's a Lock 'n' Chase redux, where your mission is to steal money in order to purchase Revival magazine. It's wacky, but damn is it fun. If you enjoy classic arcade games like Pac-Man, this is one to check out. ReVIVAL CHASE is a Lock 'n Chase style game with 5-Player Turbo-Tap support PLUS two (2) additional SHMUP* shoot-em-up games: the new RT2A and the classic Ozma Wars!
